parameters:
\N<Segi>So this is the lower level of the ruins... The pungent smell
has gotten even stronger. Without the effects of Mind Lyuda,
I wonder what would have become of my body...

\N<Segi>Mind Lyuda... This medicine is definitely corroding my body.
But thanks to it, I can stand here like this. It's quite
ironic...

\N<Segi>Still... I must go on. I can't hesitate... That's what I've
decided.

\N<Segi>A poisonous herb for transdermal toxins... I wonder if this
is it.

Inside the ruins, there are eerie creatures that are enemies
to Segi. Even if she gets hurt by contact, it will not
result in a game over. (Excluding slip damage)

However, under certain conditions, if she gets injured and
collapses, some kind of danger may befall her.

Additionally, among the enemies that roam and the contents
of treasure chests, there are individuals with special
colors.

These individuals, compared to those of normal color,
generally offer better rewards, although they include random
elements.
